item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: The Avery

This RI Monthly 2008 Best of Rhode Island Editor's Pick, and Collective favorite, is tucked away in a little west side neighborhood.  They have won rave reviews on Yelp for their "art deco/art nouveau organic wood cut walls and leather seating". And people seem happy "to have this cozy place close by."  It has also been said that "the staff is awesome, the lights are dim, and the beer selection is on point."  

The reviews are in, and The Avery gets 5 stars from most people.  If you've ever been there, then you already love it.  If you've never been there, then it's time for you to give it a try and write you're own review, so let's check it out! 

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

Sites:

http://www.yelp.com/biz/the-avery-providence

http://www.averyprovidence.com/

http://www.rimonthly.com/Rhode-Island-Monthly/Best-of-Rhode-Island/Best-of-Rhode-Island-2008-Editors-Picks/index.php/alpha/T/name/The-Avery/listing/5715/
item.how_to_find_us: It's a little place, we'll be hard to miss. :-)
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - The Avery!
